page.title: 14PLACES OF WORSHIP
page.content: The church nearest to our school is a Methodist Chapel.It is attached to a hall which is used by the Boys' Brigade and the Girls' Brigade.The Silver Band practise there too. France Lynch Parish Church is also quite close and has a hall a short way away.This is used as a Sunday school and is also used for the youngest children of the village as a play-school. The church on Coppice Hill is the Baptist Tabernacle Church and they run a Saturday club which is like Sunday School. Other Churches are in Bussage, Oakridge and Christ Church,which is in Chalford valley.Most of the churches are old and built of Cotswold stone. Quite a few people attend the places of worship in the area.
